flawed_nl_solution:
The park has 42 / 3 = <<42/3=14>>14 pink crepe myrtle trees.
It has 2 red trees, so it has 14 + 2 = <<14+2=13>>13 pink and red trees.
Therefore, there are 42 - 13 = <<42-13=29>>29 crepe myrtle trees that have white flowers when they bloom in the park.
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
